DOC.brief_summary: Fetal heart rate pattern important parameter diagnosis non-reassuring fetal status . Combined-spinal epidural analgesia method initiate labor analgesia use approximately 90 % parturients Prentice Women 's Hospital . Optimizing variable could affect fetal heart rate pattern time initiation analgesia , fluid administration oxytocin management , could help u provide good care patient fetus . Hypotheses : Patients receive 1000 mL fluid bolus low rate oxytocin administration few non-reassuring fetal heart rate ( FHR ) change .
DOC.brief_title: Association Between Fluid Administration , Oxytocin Administration , Fetal Heart Rate Changes
DOC.detailed_description: Informed , write consent obtain . At time request labor analgesia , group assignment determine open opaque envelope . Patients randomize one four group . All subject receive maintenance infusion 125 mL Lactated Ringers ( LR ) solution throughout study . For patient Groups A B , intravenous bolus 1000 mL LR initiate patient position epidural placement . The bolus administer free-flowing wide open intravenous catheter complete . Patients Groups C D receive additional fluid bolus receive maintenance infusion 125 mL LR study period . Blinding maintain Labor Delivery nurse cover LR bolus fluid bag . If patient randomize group B D , dose oxytocin currently administer halve increased duration study period ( 60 minute initiation CSE ) .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 Healthy nulliparous multiparous woman Term ( > 36 week gestation ) Singleton pregnancy Spontaneous labor spontaneous rupture membrane Receive oxytocin Request neuraxial analgesia Under 18 year old Presence systemic disease ( ex : diabetes mellitus , hypertension , preeclampsia Use chronic analgesic medication Prior administration system opioid labor analgesia Nonvertex presentation Induction Labor Contraindication neuraxial analgesia
